column1: # webanno.custom.Participants | Participant # webanno.custom.Events | Events # webanno.custom.Corefchains | Coref | AttachTo=webanno.custom.Participants
#text=I went on a bike ride in the afternoon yesterday , the weather had an amazing break of sunlight , and I had to take advantage of it .
#text=Gearing up for the bike ride was n't very time consuming , it only took about 5 minutes to change , grab my helmet , and fill a water bottle from the sink .
#text=I left home , and progressed close to 6 miles before I heard a low hiss escape from somewhere below where my feet were .
#text=I almost knew immediately that it was going to be a flat tire .
#text=I had my friend pick me up , they helped get me home without further incident .
#text=After getting my bike up on it 's stand , I began to peel the bad tire off the rim , finding the tube had a small puncture .
#text=I decided to to replace the tube entirely , and fitted the tube and tire back onto the rim , fixing the issue of the flat tire .
